name: Handy Components
description:
What is this about?

Instantly drop useful components straight on to your canvas with full auto layout support, variants and mimicking styles from your file coming soon.


Create as component & variants

Toggle an option and select a control â€“ it will be inserted to your canvas as a Figma component. Controls that consist of different states (e.g. input) will be created as variants with proper naming and properties.
